query:
SELECT 'timeSeries' as tbl, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM timeSeries
UNION ALL SELECT 'economicEvents', COUNT(*) FROM economicEvents
UNION ALL SELECT 'researchPublications', COUNT(*) FROM researchPublications
UNION ALL SELECT 'indicators', COUNT(*) FROM indicators
UNION ALL SELECT 'dataSources', COUNT(*) FROM dataSources
UNION ALL SELECT 'glossaryTerms', COUNT(*) FROM glossaryTerms
UNION ALL SELECT 'schedulerJobs', COUNT(*) FROM schedulerJobs
UNION ALL SELECT 'commercialBanks', COUNT(*) FROM commercialBanks;
